meanings: (회의·행사 등이) open, be held, take place
survey the conference venue prior to it[the conference]
survey the conference venue in advance

phrases.phrase: 여기 콘서트 홀에서 열릴 공연 스케줄이네요.
meanings: 콘서트 Here's a schedule of upcoming events at the concert hall.

vlive.korean: 동계올림픽 열릴 때 이게 광고로 나왔으면 좋겠는데... I hope it's an ad for the Winter Olympics. 듣기 View video EXO : #우리수호주접백일장 장원급제 행차요🙋📝
vlive.english: I hope it's an ad for the Winter Olympics.

vlive.english: [j-hope's boutonniere] Mine is "the flower will blossom soon".

examples.korean: Saturday’s fixture against Liverpool 발음듣기 토요일에 열릴 리버풀과의 경기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
A bell tinkled as the door opened. 발음듣기 문이 열릴 때 딸랑 하는 벨소리가 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A bell tinkled as the door opened. 발음

examples.korean: The meeting will be held in the community centre. 발음듣기 그 회의는 지역 문화회관에서 열릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The meeting will be held in the community centre. 발음

examples.korean: It is envisaged that the talks will take place in the spring. 발음듣기 그 회담은 봄에 열릴 것으로 예상된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is envisaged that the talks will take place in the spring. 발음

examples.korean: In view of the weather, the event will now be held indoors. 발음듣기 날씨를 고려하여 이제 그 행사는 실내에서 열릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In view of the weather, the event will now be held indoors. 발음
